attributes.title: Have Intention To Be Established In Superconsciousness!
attributes.description:
19 AUGUST 2020

*FIRST LET US OFFER OUR DEVOTION, PRAYER, WORSHIP, SURRENDER TO PARAMASHIVA, GANAPATI AND THEN ENTER INTO THE SATSANG.

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*INTENTION TO BE ESTABLISHED IN SUPERCONSCIOUSNESS STRENGTHENS THE MANIFESTATION OF SUPERCONSCIOUSNESS IN YOU, MAKES MANY OF YOUR UNCONSCIOUS PATTERNS IRRELEVANT, NOT ONLY COMPLETE, CLEAN AND DETOXED, THOSE PATTERNS BECOME IRRELEVANT. THEY NEVER COME BACK AGAIN.

*THREE MAJOR THINGS ARE DECLARED IN HINDU TRADITION AS A POWERFUL DETOX PROCESS, SUPPORT FOR MANIFESTING CONSCIOUS INTENTION AND SUPERCONSCIOUSNESS:
AHARA - THE DIET
ADYAYANA - SHASTRA - STUDYING THE SCRIPTURES, INFUSING POWERFUL COGNITIONS
ARADAHANA - PUJA

*THESE THREE ‘A’S PUT TOGETHER IS A SURE SHOT FOR DETOX AND TO MANIFEST CONSCIOUS INTENTION, SUPERCONSCIOUS STATE, SPACE, POWERS, BEING, ENLIGHTENMENT, EVERYTHING - ALL THE BEST THINGS.

*TODAY I AM INTRODUCING THREE NIRAHARA SAMYAMAS. WE ALREADY HAVE ONE NIRAHARA SAMYAMA. NOW I AM INTRODUCING THREE MORE.

RAMA NIRAHARA SAMYAMA
KRISHNA NIRAHARA SAMYAMA
VEDAVYASA NIRAHARA SAMYAMA

*ALL THESE THREE WILL BE MANAGED BY THE SAME TEAM UNDER SRI PRANAVANANDA WHO IS MANAGING THE NIRAHARA SAMYAMA.

*RAMA NIRAHARA SAMYAMA - FOREST FRUITS DIET, STUDYING THE 108 UPANISHAD - MUKTIKOPANSIHAD - COMPILED AND PRESENTED BY RAMACHANDRA PRABHU, AND PARAMASHIVA PUJA. 

RAMA HIMSELF DID SHIVA PUJA WHOLE LIFE WEARING RUDRAKSHA. HE WAS A GREAT BHAKTA. ENOUGH OF SHASTRA PRAMANAS ARE THERE TO SHOW THAT RAMA USED TO DO SHIVA PUJA EVERYDAY BEFORE GOING FOR THE DAY’S ACTIVITIES. I HAVE REFERENCE OF RAMA’S FRUIT DIET FROM VALMIKI RAMAYANA, 1ST SARGHA, 7TH SHLOKA: 

फलमूलाशनैर्दान्तैश्चीरकृष्णाजिनाम्बरैः।
सूर्यवैश्वानराभैश्च पुराणैर्मुनिभिर्वृतम्।।3.1.7।।

PHALAMŪLĀŚANAIRDĀNTAIŚCĪRAKṚṢṆĀJINĀMBARAIḤ.
SŪRYAVAIŚVĀNARĀBHAIŚCA PURĀṆAIRMUNIBHIRVṚTAM..3.1.7..

THEY WERE THE ANCIENT LONG-LIVING SAGES CLOTHED IN BARK AND DARK DEERSKIN, WHO BY LIVING ON FRUITS AND ROOTS, HAVE GAINED CONTROL OVER THEMSELVES AND THEIR SENSES, AND HAVE GLOWING RADIANCE LIKE THE SUN OR THE FIRE.

*THIS IS THE VANAVASA DIET. I HAVE MORE SHASTRA PRAMANAS. I WILL PUT EVERYTHING IN THE FACEBOOK.

*ANYONE WHO WANTS TO GET ENLIGHTENED, PLEASE PRACTICE THIS RAMA NIRAHARA SAMYAMA TO REALISE THE UPANISHADS.

*PRAMANA FOR FRUITS AND ROOTS MANIFEST VICTORY OVER SENSES AND MANIFEST DIVINE RADIANCE - AURA. 
SRIMAD VALMIKI RAMAYANA II ARANYA KANDAM II 1ST SARGA, 7TH SLOKA 

फलमूलाशनैर्दान्तैश्चीरकृष्णाजिनाम्बरैः।
सूर्यवैश्वानराभैश्च पुराणैर्मुनिभिर्वृतम्।।3.1.7।।

PHALAMŪLĀŚANAIRDĀNTAIŚCĪRAKṚṢṆĀJINĀMBARAIḤ.
SŪRYAVAIŚVĀNARĀBHAIŚCA PURĀṆAIRMUNIBHIRVṚTAM..3.1.7..

THEY WERE THE ANCIENT LONG-LIVING SAGES CLOTHED IN BARK AND DARK DEERSKIN, WHO BY LIVING ON FRUITS AND ROOTS, HAVE GAINED CONTROL OVER THEMSELVES AND THEIR SENSES, AND HAVE GLOWING RADIANCE LIKE THE SUN OR THE FIRE.

*THE MOST TRUSTED BIOGRAPHY OF RAMA VERIFIED BY RAMA HIMSELF, SUNG BY LAVA AND KUSHA IN RAMA SABHA, RAMA’S COURT. THIS IS VALMIKI RAMAYANA, ARANYA KANDA, 1ST SARGA, 22ND SHLOKA:

*SRIMAD VALMIKI RAMAYANA II ARANYA KANDAM II 1ST SARGA, 17TH SLOKA 

पुष्पं मूलं फलं सर्वमाश्रमं च महात्मनः।
निवेदयित्वा धर्मज्ञास्ते ततः प्राञ्जलयोऽब्रुवन्।।3.1.17।।

PUṢPAṂ MŪLAṂ PHALAṂ SARVAMĀŚRAMAṂ CA MAHĀTMANAḤ.
NIVEDAYITVĀ DHARMAJÑĀSTE TATAḤ PRĀÑJALAYO'BRUVAN..3.1.17..

THE SAGES WHO WERE KNOWERS OF DHARMA SALUTED THE NOBLE RAMA, OFFERED FRUITS, ROOTS AND FLOWERS AVAILABLE AT THE HERMITAGE AND WITH FOLDED PALMS ADDRESSED HIM .

*SRIMAD VALMIKI RAMAYANA II ARANYA KANDAM II 1ST SARGA, 22ND SLOKA:

एवमुक्त्वा फलैर्मूलैः पुष्पैर्वन्यैश्च राघवम्।
अन्यैश्च विविधाहारैः सलक्ष्मणमपूजयन्।।3.1.22।।

EVAMUKTVĀ PHALAIRMŪLAIḤ PUṢPAIRVANYAIŚCA RĀGHAVAM.
ANYAIŚCA VIVIDHĀHĀRAIḤ SALAKṢMAṆAMAPŪJAYAN..3.1.22..

HAVING SAID SO, THE SAGES OFFERED WITH REVERENCE - FRUITS, ROOTS, FLOWERS AND OTHER FOREST FOODS TO RAMA AND LAKSHMANA.

ARANYA KANDAM, 74TH SARGHA, 17TH SHLOKA:

*SRIMAD VALMIKI RAMAYANA II ARANYA KANDAM II 74TH SARGA, 17TH SLOKA: 

मया तु विविधं वन्यं सञ्चितं पुरुषर्षभ।
तवार्थे पुरुषव्याघ्र पम्पायास्तीरसम्भवम्।।3.74.17।।

MAYĀ TU VIVIDHAṂ VANYAṂ SAÑCITAṂ PURUṢARṢABHA.
TAVĀRTHE PURUṢAVYĀGHRA PAMPĀYĀSTĪRASAMBHAVAM..3.74.17..

SABARI SAID-
O BEST AMONG MEN I HAVE COLLECTED AND KEPT FOR YOUR SAKE DIFFERENT KINDS OF FOREST FOOD GROWN ON THE BANK OF PAMPA.

THESE SHASTRA PRAMANAS SHOW VERY CLEARLY THE DIET OF SRI RAMACHANDRA.
